data.text: @WelshGovernment @PublicHealthW @Pembrokeshire @BBCRadioWales When are you going to get people back into work as opposed to working from home?? I’ve heard first hand of many council employees who are flouting the work from home advice by playing golf & sitting in their hot tubs whilst receiving work calls!!

@WelshGovernment @PublicHealthW Now let’s have an independent public enquiry to determine how effective or damaging the Governments response to the pandemic was. It’s the least the Welsh public deserve after two years of restrictions.
@WelshGovernment @PublicHealthW So over a million with nothing, now bore off
@WelshGovernment @PublicHealthW Your fear mongering is worse than the virus!
